    Function reference

    All functions

    AR()
    Autoregressive Prior
    AR1()
    AR1 Prior
    HMD
    Components from Human Mortality Database
    Known()
    Known Prior
    LFP
    Components from OECD Labour Force Participation Data
    Lin()
    Linear Prior
    LinAR()
    Linear Prior with Autoregressive Errors
    LinAR1()
    Linear Prior with AR1 Errors
    N()
    Normal Prior
    NFix()
    Normal Prior with Fixed Variance
    RW()
    Random Walk Prior
    RW2()
    Random Walk with Drift Prior
    RW2Seas()
    Random Walk with Drift Prior, with Seasonal Effect
    RWSeas()
    Random Walk Prior, with Seasonal Effect
    SVD()
    SVD Prior for Age
    SVDS()
    SVD Prior for Age-Sex or Age-Gender
    Sp()
    P-Spline Prior
    augment(<bage_mod>)
    Extract Data and Modelled Values
    components(<bage_mod>)
    Extract Values for Hyper-Parameters
    components(<bage_ssvd>)
    Extract Components used by SVD Summary
    deaths
    Deaths in Iceland
    divorces
    Divorces in New Zealand
    expenditure
    Per Capita Health Expenditure in the Netherlands, 2003-2011
    fit(<bage_mod>)
    Fit a model
    forecast(<bage_mod>)
    Use a Model to Make a Forecast
    generate(<bage_ssvd>)
    Generate Random Age or Age-Sex Profiles
    households
    People in One-person households in New Zealand
    injuries
    Fatal Injuries in New Zealand
    is_fitted()
    Test Whether a Model has Been Fitted
    mod_binom()
    Specify a Binomial Model
    mod_norm()
    Specify a Normal Model
    mod_pois()
    Specify a Poisson Model
    priors
    Priors for Intercept, Main Effects, Interactions
    replicate_data()
    Draw from the Prior Predictive Distribution of a Model
    report_sim()
    Simulation study of a model
    set_disp()
    Set Mean in Prior for Dispersion or Standard Deviation
    set_n_draw()
    Set the number of draws
    set_prior()
    Specify a Prior
    set_var_age()
    Set the age variable
    set_var_sexgender()
    Set a sex or gender variable
    set_var_time()
    Set the time variable
    ssvd()
    Create an Object to Hold Data from a Scaled SVD
    ssvd_comp()
    Create components needed by a ssvd object
    ssvd_hmd()
    Create a Scaled SVD Object from a Human Mortality Database File
    tidy(<bage_mod>)
    Main effects and interactions from a fitted model
    us_acc_deaths
    Accidental Deaths in the USA

    Developed by John Bryant, Junni Zhang.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.9.
